product_name: The North Face Midtown Tote - 2013 Closeout
long_description: For those days that have you running all over town, The North Face Midtown tote has plenty of durable storage to hold your laptop and books, plus a water bottle for on-the-go hydration. Features a large main compartment with slip-in pockets and padded laptop sleeve (fits most 15" laptops). Zip top; side water bottle pockets with cinch closures. The North Face Midtown tote has a front zip pocket with magnetic flap closure. Closeout.
short_description: For those days that have you running all over town, The North Face Midtown tote has plenty of durable storage to hold your laptop and books, plus a water bottle for on-the-go hydration.
